FILE: cm339343v11.0.txt
DYAD: ALBANIA - MACEDONIA
RIVALRY: RIV881
DISPUTE(S): MID4058 MID4097 

PS-NOTES:

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20180909
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20180909

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID4058 

TERRMID: MID4058 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID4058 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID4058 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID4058 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID4058 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID4058 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID4058 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID4058 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID4058 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID4058 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES: MID4058 from cm narrative, Albanian soldiers, crossing into Macedonian territory, fired on Macedonian soldiers. Macedonian soldiers returned fire. Albania protested. Coded not civil war because although there was a significant number of ethnic Albanians in Macedonia and an Albanian ethnic rebel group would later form (in 2001) to fight against Macedonia, this group was not formed yet and there is no indication that this incident was connected to any militarized rebel activity in either country. 

CIVWARLINK: MID4058 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID4058 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID4058 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID4058 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID4058 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID4058 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID4097 

TERRMID: MID4097 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID4097 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID4097 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID4097 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID4097 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID4097 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID4097 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID4097 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID4097 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID4097 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES: MID4097 from cm narrative, when Albanian soldiers walked in Macedonian territory, Macedonian soldiers opened fire on them, causing the Albanian soldiers to flee. Coded not civil war MID because although there was a significant number of ethnic Albanians in Macedonia and an Albanian ethnic rebel group would later form (in 2001) to fight against Macedonia, this group was not formed yet and there is no indication that this incident was connected to any militarized rebel activity in either country.

CIVWARLINK: MID4097 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID4097 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES:

COUPMID-CER: MID4097 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID4097 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID4097 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID4412 

TERRMID: MID4412 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID4412 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID4412 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID4412 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID4412 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID4412 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID4412 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID4412 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID4412 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID4412 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES: MID4412 from cm narrative, six Macedonian soldiers crossed the border between Macedonia and Albania at noon on 7/21/2012. The Macedonian troops crossed 300 meters into Albania and fired on 6 residents in a local village. Albanian civilians were wounded by Macedonian fire. Albania demanded Macedonia join a bilateral verification commission to evaluate the incident, which the latter agreed to do. Coded not civil war MID because although there was an ethnic Albanian rebel group operating in Macedonia at the time, there is no indication that this incident was connected to any rebel group activity. 

CIVWARLINK: MID4412 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID4412 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID4412 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID4412 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID4412 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID4412 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID4 2002-2010:

MID4412
rivalry=339343 nationa=MACEDONIA nationb=ALBANIA MID4412 20020721-20020721 
 revtype1a=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2a=NOT APPLICABLE fatala=NONE fatalpa=0 lhosta=USE OF FORCE 
 revtype1b=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2b=NOT APPLICABLE fatalb=NONE fatalpb=0
lhostb=NO MILITARIZED ACTION 

Six Macedonian soldiers crossed the border between Macedonia and Albania at noon on 7/21/2012. The Macedonian troops crossed 300 meters into Albania and fired on 6 residents in a local village. Albanian civilians were wounded by Macedonian fire. Albania demanded Macedonia join a bilateral verification commission to evaluate the incident, which the latter agreed to. Last day of dispute was on 7/21/2002.

MID3 1993-2001:

MID4058
rivalry=339343 nationa=ALBANIA nationb=MACEDONIA MID4058 19930626-19930626 
 revtype1a=POLICY revtype2a=NOT APPLICABLE fatala=1-25 DEATHS fatalpa=1 lhosta=USE OF FORCE 
 revtype1b=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2b=NOT APPLICABLE fatalb=NONE fatalpb=0
lhostb=USE OF FORCE 

Albanian soldiers, crossing into Macedonian territory, fired on Macedonian soldiers. Macedonian soldiers returned fire. Albania protested. First and last day of dispute was on 6/26/1993.

MID4097
rivalry=339343 nationa=ALBANIA nationb=MACEDONIA MID4097 19970313-19970313 
 revtype1a=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2a=NOT APPLICABLE fatala=NONE fatalpa=0 lhosta=USE OF FORCE 
 revtype1b=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2b=NOT APPLICABLE fatalb=NONE fatalpb=0
lhostb=USE OF FORCE 

Albanian soldiers walked in Macedonian territory; Macedonian soldiers opened fire on them, causing the Albanian soldiers to flee. First and last day of dispute was on 3/13/1997.
